titleInfo.title: Zebra finches bi-directionally selected for personality differ in repeatability of corticosterone and testosterone

mods.abstract: Data to the publication "Zebra finches bi-directionally selected for personality differ in repeatability of corticosterone and testosterone" to appear in Hormones & Behavior
